title: Brazil, Spain trade corn and shoes

content.prompt: The table above shows the amount of labor required to produce a unit of corn and a unit of shoes in Brazil and Spain. If both countries have equal numbers of workers, what pattern of international trade between Brazil and Spain is most likely to emerge?

choices.label: Brazil will export both corn and shoes.
Spain will export both corn and shoes.
Brazil will export corn and import shoes.
Brazil will import corn and export shoes.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
